code_value: Questions 1~2  Your friend Li Ming has just come back from the English summer camp in Canada. Ask him two questions about it. </br>Questions 3~4  It is your mother’s birthday tomorrow and you have no idea about what to buy as a birthday gift. Ask your friend for advice.
